entities.name: the dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is introduced as a sign that appears in the wood, causing screams and panic. It is described as 'Voldemort's sign' by Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to understand what is happening around him. He is called upon by Hermione to move away from the Dark Mark.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's and is terrified by the appearance of the Dark Mark. She tries to pull Harry away from it.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who is associated with the Dark Mark. His name is used in a fearful and ominous tone by Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who is also present in the clearing when the Dark Mark appears. He helps to scoop up his miniature Krum and move away from the scene.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is an object that Ron scoops up as they are moving away from the Dark Mark.

relationships.description: Harry is near the Dark Mark when it appears, causing him to be startled and confused.
Hermione is also near the Dark Mark when it appears, causing her to become terrified and try to pull Harry away from it.
Ron has Krum with him as they are moving away from the Dark Mark.
